alert.note: Alert for Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 3:21PM MDT until June 27 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CROOK COUNTY... At 321 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Warren Peak, or 8 miles northwest of Sundance, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sundance, Beulah, Vore Buffalo Jump, Aladdin, Warren Peak and Cook Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 186 and 207. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
